Allen admitted to becoming emotional watching Steinfeld's performance, highlighting his pride in her talent. The couple, married in May 2025, skillfully balance their demanding careers. Steinfeld often adjusts her schedule to support Allen's NFL season, demonstrating their mutual dedication.

Following a similar incident in cricket, Pakistani players are instructed to ignore potential non-handshakes and avoid any on-field altercations. The federation stresses maintaining focus on the game amidst these diplomatic tensions.

description: Legendary spinner Harbhajan Singh expressed confidence in Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma's prolific run-scoring in the upcoming ODI series against Australia. Singh highlighted Kohli's exceptional fitness and predicted he would score at least two centuries in Australia, his favored batting ground. He anticipates both stalwarts will perform exceptionally well, contributing significantly to India's victories.

description: Two hostages, Bipin Joshi and Tamir Nimrodi, remain unaccounted for after Hamas's latest release of 20 living captives. While 20 living hostages and 28 bodies are part of the deal, the fate of these two is unknown. Joshi, a Nepalese student, was abducted during the October 7th attack. His family recently released footage, hoping for his return.

title: Mohammed Siraj collapses after long spell, receives 'king-like' treatment - See pic
description: Delhi's intense heat overwhelmed Indian pacer Mohammed Siraj, causing him to collapse from exhaustion during the second Test against the West Indies. After a demanding spell, he received immediate medical attention.  Despite the challenging conditions and the West Indies' strong batting performance, India is poised for a series victory.

title: PCB chief Naqvi asks ICC to ready backup plan amid Tri-series uncertainty
description: Pakistan Cricket Board is developing backup plans for a T20 Tri-Series involving Sri Lanka, as Afghanistan's participation remains uncertain due to bilateral tensions. The series, slated for November, faces potential scheduling conflicts with a proposed series against Sri Lanka in January, impacting Pakistani players' availability for the Big Bash League and potentially causing friction with Cricket Australia.

Siraj also became the leading Test wicket-taker in 2025, dismissing Shai Hope for his 37th wicket of the year.

description: The Royal Swedish Academy of Sciences honored Joel Mokyr, Philippe Aghion, and Peter Howitt with the 2025 Nobel Memorial Prize in Economic Sciences. Their groundbreaking work explains how innovation drives sustained economic growth, a phenomenon that has lifted millions out of poverty. This recognition highlights their significant contributions to understanding long-term prosperity through technological progress and creative destruction.

The group, protesting in solidarity with Palestine and against recognizing Israel, reported numerous casualties and injuries amid violent clashes.

Google VP of Product not happy With Silicon Valley's love for small teams; says they are 'wrong' because…
description: Google VP Robby Stein warns against Silicon Valley's "cult" of lean teams, arguing that underinvestment kills promising products. He emphasizes that foundational AI breakthroughs require scale and patience, and teams should transition from scrappiness to scaling once internal conviction and external user validation are achieved. Stein advocates for building capable teams to create strong product versions, not just the smallest ones.

Apple's former CEO John Sculley 'confirms' Tim Cook may be planning to retire
description: Former Apple CEO John Sculley suggests Tim Cook might retire soon, emphasizing the need for a successor to guide Apple into the 'agentic era' beyond apps. Sculley also identified OpenAI as Apple's first significant competitor in years, highlighting a shift towards subscription models and smart agents over numerous applications.

Durgapur to RG Kar: Are Bengal’s campuses safe? CM’s ‘stay inside’ stance questioned
description: Despite Kolkata's reputation as India's safest city, female students in West Bengal face a growing crisis of insecurity. Recent brutal assaults, like the Durgapur gang rape, highlight persistent gaps in campus security and institutional accountability. Chief Minister Mamata Banerjee's advice for women to stay indoors has drawn widespread condemnation, reinforcing a culture of victim-blaming rather than addressing systemic failures.

Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor’s WhatsApp plea; suggests Zoho’s Arattai
description: The Supreme Court of India has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right. A doctor's petition seeking restoration of her blocked account was dismissed, with the court suggesting alternative apps like Zoho's Arattai. The ruling emphasizes that users must adhere to platform policies for privately operated services.

title: Watch: Trump gets 'thank you' note at Tel Aviv beachfront; Air Force One flies over it
description: US President Donald Trump arrived in Israel, greeted by a large "Thank You" banner along the Tel Aviv coastline. During his four-hour visit, he met with hostage families, held talks with Prime Minister Netanyahu, and addressed lawmakers. The visit coincides with the second anniversary of the October 7th attacks and the return of some hostages.

title: 4 everyday drinks to prevent artery plaque buildup and boost blood circulation
description: Nourishing your arteries involves mindful eating and drinking. Certain beverages like green tea, pomegranate juice, beetroot juice, and turmeric milk can significantly support heart health by reducing inflammation, lowering bad cholesterol, and promoting healthy blood flow. While plaque buildup cannot be reversed, these drinks can help stabilize and potentially shrink it.

title: Bhopal: After fight over ‘change’, delivery boy returns with 8, thrashes 2
description: A dispute over change for a Rs 474 delivery escalated into violence in Bhopal's Kolar area. A quick commerce company's delivery boy returned with several colleagues, armed with sticks, and assaulted two helpers of a businessman. The group caused a significant disturbance for over half an hour before fleeing. A video of the incident has since gone viral.

title: Tech crash: Trump’s China tariffs causes $770 bn wipeout from Amazon, Nvidia, Tesla
description: Tech giants like Amazon, Nvidia, and Tesla faced a massive $770 billion market value drop following President Trump's threat of 100% tariffs on China and export controls.  This significant market downturn, the worst since April, also impacted the Nasdaq and S&P 500, with Bitcoin experiencing a sharp decline as well.

title: Top 5 sectors reshaping jobs in 2025: Tech and green skills surge; new roles emerge
description: The India Skills Report 2025 reveals the top five sectors reshaping workforce needs globally, highlighting growing demand for digital skills and renewable energy roles. Technology, healthcare, fintech, renewable energy, and e-commerce are driving job growth across key regions. The report emphasises the importance of upskilling and formal employment to meet evolving talent demands, positioning India as a major player in the global workforce transformation by 2025.

title: Report: Taylor Swift, Blake Lively reunite; Travis Kelce quietly present
description: Whispers suggest Taylor Swift and Blake Lively have rekindled their friendship after months of rumored distance, fueled by Lively's recent lawsuit drama. Swift's new song, 'CANCELLED!', is believed to be a tribute to Lively's public struggles. This potential reunion hints at Swift rebalancing her life amidst her relationship with Travis Kelce and her global tour.

title: Inside Patrick & Brittany Mahomes’ happy life with Sterling, Bronze, Golden
description: NFL star Patrick Mahomes and wife Brittany are cherishing moments with their three children: Sterling, Bronze, and Golden. Despite the spotlight, they prioritize a normal family life, often sharing glimpses of their joy.  Golden's birth during the playoffs highlighted their commitment to balancing football and family, showcasing a loving and grounded household.
